arguments.description: Starting index position of range to set.
arguments.name: start_pos

arguments.description: Ending index position of range to set. If this value is greater than array length, Railo adds elements to array.
arguments.name: end_pos

arguments.description: Value to which to set each element in the range.
arguments.name: value

description:
In a one-dimensional array, sets the elements in a specified
        index range to a value. Useful for initializing an array after
        a call to ArrayNew.
name: arrayset
